en-us: Convert parts into terrain with ease.
If checked, the plugin will check for updates at Studio launch and display a notice on the plugin when outdated. If unchecked, the plugin will not for any updates.
If checked, the part used to be converted will be delete. If unchecked, it will stay in the Workspace when converted.
Allow a SelectionBox overlay when the mouse is hovering over a part.
Parts with their Locked property set to true will not be converted.
Ignoring locked part due to settings.
